column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I had ordered the salmon tartine and the vanilla bean scone with a snow dragon tea. While they were all good
column2: I was expecting more flavor and was a bit disappointed when it was not what I expected. The salmon tartine was a bit on the salty side for me
column3: and the bread tasted a bit stale. The vanilla bean scone was quite dry
column4: so I had to slather it in butter and jam so that my mouth didn't feel like it was full of cotton. However
column5: the snow dragon tea was quite wonderful! Not too sweet and no weird after taste I sometimes have when drinking tea.
